content.html: Today's my birthday and I'd love to hear about things that have made you happy recently. No cynicism, no twitter-doom, just happy or kind things. I'll start: My spouse named our coffee machine the Breville Jonk Jonk after the sound it makes when steaming milk.
content.value:
Today's my birthday and I'd love to hear about things that have made you happy recently. No cynicism, no twitter-doom, just happy or kind things. I'll start:

My spouse named our coffee machine the Breville Jonk Jonk after the sound it makes when steaming milk.
